Helper-array-add.sublime-snippet.description: Add an element to an array using "dot" notation if it doesn't exist.

Helper-array-collapse.sublime-snippet.description: Collapse an array of arrays into a single array.

Helper-array-data_get.sublime-snippet.description: Get an item from an array using "dot" notation.

Helper-array-divide.sublime-snippet.description: Divide an array into two arrays. One with keys and the other with values.

Helper-array-dot.sublime-snippet.description: Flatten a multi-dimensional associative array with dots.

Helper-array-end.sublime-snippet.description: Get the last element of an array. Useful for method chaining.

Helper-array-except.sublime-snippet.description: Get all of the given array except for a specified array of items.

Helper-array-first.sublime-snippet.description: Return the first element in an array passing a given truth test.

Helper-array-flatten.sublime-snippet.description: Will flatten a multi-dimensional array into a single level.

Helper-array-forget.sublime-snippet.description: Remove one or many array items from a given array using "dot" notation.

Helper-array-get.sublime-snippet.description: Get an item from an array using "dot" notation.

Helper-array-has.sublime-snippet.description: Check if an item exists in an array using "dot" notation.

Helper-array-head.sublime-snippet.description: Get the first element of an array. Useful for method chaining.

Helper-array-last.sublime-snippet.description: Return the last element in an array passing a given truth test.

Helper-array-only.sublime-snippet.description: Get a subset of the items from the given array.

Helper-array-pluck.sublime-snippet.description: Pluck an array of values from an array.

Helper-array-prepend.sublime-snippet.description: Push an item onto the beginning of an array.

Helper-array-pull.sublime-snippet.description: Get a value from the array, and remove it.

Helper-array-set.sublime-snippet.description: Set an array item to a given value using "dot" notation.

Helper-array-sort-recursive.sublime-snip.description: Recursively sort an array by keys and values.

Helper-array-sort.sublime-snippet.description: Sort the array using the given callback.

Helper-array-where.sublime-snippet.description: Filter the array using the given callback.

Helper-misc-class_uses-recursive.sublime.description: Returns all traits used by a class, its subclasses and trait of their traits.

Helper-misc-collect.sublime-snippet.description: Create a collection from the given value.

Helper-misc-csrf_field.sublime-snippet.description: Get the value of the current CSRF token.

Helper-misc-csrf_token.sublime-snippet.description: Get the value of the current CSRF token.

Helper-misc-dd.sublime-snippet.description: Dump the passed variables and end the script.

Helper-misc-object_get.sublime-snippet.description: Get an item from an object using "dot" notation.

Helper-misc-trait_uses-recursive.sublime.description: Returns all traits used by a trait and its traits.

Helper-path-app.sublime-snippet.description: Get the fully qualified path to the app directory.

Helper-path-base.sublime-snippet.description: Get the fully qualified path to the root of the application install.

Helper-path-config.sublime-snippet.description: Get the fully qualified path to the app directory.

Helper-path-elixir.sublime-snippet.description: Get the path to the versionned Elixir file.

Helper-path-public.sublime-snippet.description: Get the fully qualified path to the public directory.

Helper-path-storage.sublime-snippet.description: Get the fully qualified path to the app/storage directory.

Helper-strings-camel_case.sublime-snippe.description: Convert a value to camel case.

Helper-strings-class_basename.sublime-sn.description: Get the class "basename" of the given object / class.

Helper-strings-e.sublime-snippet.description: Escape HTML entities in a string.

Helper-strings-ends_with.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if a given string ends with a given substring.

Helper-strings-snake_case.sublime-snippe.description: Convert the given string to snake_case.

Helper-strings-starts_with.sublime-snipp.description: Determine if the given haystack begins with the given needle.

Helper-strings-str_contains.sublime-snip.description: Determine if the given haystack contains the given needle.

Helper-strings-str_finish.sublime-snippe.description: Determine if a given string matches a given pattern. Asterisks may be used to indicate wildcards.

Helper-strings-str_is.sublime-snippet.description: Add a single instance of the given needle to the haystack. Remove any extra instances.

Helper-strings-str_limit.sublime-snippet.description: Limit the number of characters in a string.

Helper-strings-str_random.sublime-snippe.description: Generate a random string of the given length.

Helper-strings-str_singular.sublime-snip.description: Convert a string to its singular form (English only).

Helper-strings-str_slug.sublime-snippet.description: Generate a URL friendly "slug" from a given string.

Helper-strings-studly_case.sublime-snipp.description: Convert the given string to StudlyCase.

Helper-strings-title_case.sublime-snippe.description: Convert a value to title case.

Helper-strings-trans.sublime-snippet.description: Translate a given language line. Alias of Lang::get.

Helper-strings-trans_choice.sublime-snip.description: Translate a given language line with inflection. Alias of Lang::choice.

Helper-strings_plural.sublime-snippet.description: Convert a string to its plural form (English only).

Helper-url-action.sublime-snippet.description: Generate a URL for a given controller action.

Helper-url-asset.sublime-snippet.description: Generate a URL for an asset.

Helper-url-route.sublime-snippet.description: Generate a URL for a given named route.

Helper-url-secure_asset.sublime-snippet.description: Generate a HTML link to the given asset using HTTPS.

Helper-url-secure_url.sublime-snippet.description: Generate a fully qualified URL to a given path using HTTPS.

Helper-url.sublime-snippet.description: Generate a fully qualified URL to the given path.
